text: Carl von Gontard (January 13, 1731 in Mannheim – September 23, 1791 in Breslau) was a German architect; he worked primarily in the German cities Berlin, Potsdam, and Bayreuth. He modified the original Deutscher Dom and Französischer Dom cathedrals in Berlin and added the domed towers.answers.com == References == ==Other websites== Category:1731 births Category:1791 deaths Category:German architects Category:People from Mannheim
title: Carl von Gontard
